content: **errata** updates are in **bold** pg 4 row 6 bobble 3 p33 pm p10 **pm ** p to end turn 76 sts seedling vest is worked in the round from the bottom up the construction of most of the seed stitch boarders are integrated into the pattern so only the stitches at the armholes need to be picked up german short row are used to create the shoulders and kitchener stitch to graft those pieces together finished measurements and yardage requirements circumference 41 in / 104 cm length from shoulder to hem 22 in / 55 5 cm yarn used about 500 yds / 250 g the yarn used in the sample was white barn farm sheep and wool light worsted/dk i suggest that you over budget on the amount of yardage necessary to complete the project as each knitter knits differently and there may be a discrepancy in the actual amount of yarn used please email me at yellowcayenne@icloud com or send me a message on instagram @yellowcayenne if you have any questions on this pattern this gratuitous pattern has not been tested nor tech edited
